QuestData.Title: The Unending Siege
QuestData.Description: The mantid continue to attack us. Their numbers ebb and flow, but they do not stop.$b$bIt is no matter. The yak is stamina embodied. We will not bend to them. We will defend his home forever.$b$bWill you help us?
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat 12 Sra'thik attackers at Niuzao Temple.
